course.subject: ELEC
course.name: Digital Circuits and Systems
course.description: Design of combinatorial and sequential logic circuits; introduction to logic families (TTL and CMOS); programmable logic devices; special digital systems. Laboratory assignments make extensive use of computer-aided design (CAD) tools for design, simulation and testing.
course.prerequisites: ELEC 1100 OR ELEC 1200

reviews.author: ngkaho1234
reviews.title: Grade就OK嘅，對於無玩過ELEC野嘅人亦似乎唔難
reviews.comment_content:
Content主要講嘅我覺得有5樣:
* Boolean Algebra
* Combinational logic
* Sequential logic
* Turing machine and Mealy machine
* Programmable Logic Device
reviews.comment_teaching:
Zhang平時完咗Lecture後如果你想問佢野都幾容易approach。如果你想revise嘅話，有齊lecture notes同埋video喺course page。

Tang Tang嘅Tutorial好有用。入面會講番lecture嘅concept，然後就係點樣去做一個星期跟住落嚟嘅Prelab同埋Lab，亦會講你midterm或者final可能會見到嘅野。我覺得你去咗有聽嘅話你即使無點接觸過Elec野（例如我）你都唔會做lab嘅時候拖太多時間做lab。儘量去足唔好skip。平時你有問題嘅話要搵Tang Tang 亦好容易。
reviews.comment_grading:
Laboratory (includes project) - 30% (prelab+ lab demonstration + summary sheet + project)
Midterm Exam - 30%
Final Exam - 40%

你如果above mean（過大約1個SD?)嘅話我覺得要攞B+或者A其實並唔難……
reviews.comment_workload:
Workload嘅話主要喺Lab。Lab系compulsory嘅，你做lab嘅時候要同時做好prelab去俾TA check，喺下一個lab（多數）或者今個lab（少數）嘅時候交summary sheet。你做lab做得快手嘅話，可以攞少少bonus分（bonus分有3階，無記錯1個鐘做嗮嘅話bonus最高，如果喺完lab先做嗮嘅話就無）。BTW，lab系24小時開，所以你可以先提前準備好lab甚至完成，咁去到lab嘅時候你就攞硬bonus。

有Homework，可以交去俾TA，但唔係compulsory（佢話關鍵時候可以用homework分救你一命？）Homework Grade系0%。當然，homework主要喺圍繞番lecture嘅topic嘅exercise，你做咗交俾TA check同計分肯定無蝕底。

reviews.comment_content:
This course introduces the principle of the combinational and sequential logic circuits, asking students to design some simple digital circuit via CAD.
Overall, the content is not too much and easily to be learnt.

Topics:
1: binary number
2: boolean
3: logic minimization
3b: logic gate implementation
4: combinational logic
4b: other combinational logic
5: VHDL(optional)
6: flip-flop and latch
7a: register
7b: counter
8: FSM analysis
9: FSM
9 extra: FSM design example
10: circuit parameter
11: PLD
reviews.comment_teaching: The lecture is a litter boring while the tutorial is helpful for the lab. It may be better to have a self-study.
reviews.comment_grading:
It's easy to get a good grade if you understand the contents.

Grading policy:
Lab (including project): 30%
Mid-term examinations: 30%
Final examination: 40%
Homework: 0%(but would be graded)

mid: 81/100
final: 75/100
lab: nearly full mark

get an A- grade
reviews.comment_workload: no much workload. There are only 5 assignments and around 4 lab projects. Take the notes and have a review, everything is alright.

reviews.author: MayFirst
reviews.comment_content:
This course is about sequence logic and combinational logic circuits. It also covers programmable logic devices and finite state machine using those circuits. Lectures, tutorials and labs were interesting and well structured.
1. Binary number
2. Boolean
3. Logic minization & Logic gate implementation
4. Combinational logic
5. VHDL
6. Flip-Flop and Latch
7. Register & Counter
8. FSM analysis
9. FSM
10. Circuit parameter
11. PLD
Some lectures are unfortunately skipped because of several days off but most of them are covered.
reviews.comment_teaching: To be grateful to our YOBAS who work heart out to teach and cultivate us, really.
reviews.comment_grading:
midterm (30%)
assignment (0%)
lab(30%)
final(40%)
reviews.comment_workload: assignment is quite easy but no grading.

reviews.author: JMW
reviews.comment_content:
This course is about sequence logic and combinational logic circuits. It also covers programmable logic devices and finite state machine using those circuits. Lectures, tutorials and labs were interesting and well structured.
1. Binary number
2. Boolean
3. Logic minization & Logic gate implementation
4. Combinational logic
5. VHDL
6. Flip-Flop and Latch
7. Register & Counter
8. FSM analysis
9. FSM
10. Circuit parameter
11. PLD
Some lectures are unfortunately skipped because of several days off but most of them are covered.
reviews.comment_teaching:
It was one of my favorite lectures. Professor explains the content in detail and was being interactive with the class. He usually teaches without any materials which I found out helpful because I could use lecture notes for revision along with note I take in the class.

Tang Tang was supportive and was great in terms of teaching. He brought many examples in tutorials and often visited the lab to help us. There is one review session before the midterm and the final respectively, you are encouraged to attend since these are really helpful.
reviews.comment_grading:
Grade is reasonable so worth to work hard.
Midterm exam – 30% (9x and Mean 59.3 & SD 24.6)
Final exam – 40% (8x and Mean 47.8 & SD 25.3)
Lab – 30% (did not really sum up all the lab scores but I think I got overall 9x)
Homework - this is optional but possibly upgrade your letter grade
In the end, I was able to get A+
reviews.comment_workload: I think the overall workload is not heavy considering this is 4 credits course. Lab can be tiring because you will need to prepare well beforehand. Homework is optional so if you find out too much workload on this course, you do not need to do the homework.

reviews.author: LOLOL
reviews.title: Easy Course with Good Grades!
reviews.comment_content:
Before midterm: Combinational Logic.
You start with the most simple boolean algebra, moving onto Kmap, CMOS and some other stuffs like multiplexers, decoders and AOI gates. Stuff similar to ELEC1100, very simple.
After midterm: VHDL and Sequential Logic
You will be introduced with flip flops and finite state machines, and how to implement them in VHDL. These would be relevatively new contents for most people, but the ideas are not that hard.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Professor Yobas is a great teacher who covers all the contents. He also responds to emails pretty fast.
However, his lectures are not following the lecture notes, so unless you have read the lecture notes ahead, you will find it hard to match them.
Tang Tang is a great TA!
reviews.comment_grading:
30% labs and mini project (with bonuses)
30% midterm
40% final
0% homework but if you do all of them you might get boosted one subgrade if you are close to the boundaries.
Personally I feel like the grading is very easy as the contents are easy if you study. Lab bonuses are added when you finish labs early, but if you exceed full mark the bonus will not carry to the next lab.

Personally, I scored full marks for all the labs before the last 2 and miniproject (didn't answer the TA's questions correctly). Did all the homeworks but didn't get good grades in them (dk if it matters), scored 94/100 in midterm (mean 58) and 95/100 in final (mean 48) and got A+ in the end.
One thing to note is that there were around 10 people scoring more than 95 in midterm despite the low mean, so I think the grading is very good.
reviews.comment_workload: Labs are a little annoying since you have to do them beforehand for bonuses, but other than that the course doesn't have much workload

reviews.author: Booo
reviews.comment_content:
topics:
Binary Numbers
Boolean Algebra and Logic Gates
Gate-Level Minimization Logic Gate Implementation
Combinational Logic
Sequential Logic (Latches & Flip-flops)
Registers
Counters Chapter Analysis of Finite State Machines (FSM)
Circuit parameters of logic gates and sequential elements
PLD
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof Wei講解好仔細。覺得教得慢既同學可以自修。但影片既質素個人認為唔太好，可能因為上堂既地方個攝影機唔夠好，最好都係上一上。

tutorial會教埋lab點做，值得一上。
reviews.comment_grading:
- Lab 30%      (最好prelab)
- Midterm exam 30%  (大約week8)
- Final exam40%   (2018 fall好早就考 時間分配要小心)
- HW 0%(optional ，大約半班左右既人會交功課，而且多數交既都接近滿分)
reviews.comment_workload:
8次lab要去夠7次，少過7次成科fail。
hardware lab de唔到bug=完成唔到=拎唔足分。
software lab 最好提早寫好code，課程會用到vhdl(中期tutorial 會教)，
lab 早做完有bonus 分別係20% 同 10%  但滿分有上限，變相只係鼓勵同學們prelab
midterm/final 要小心，好多時唔小心就成題錯無左十幾分。
HW 可以唔洗交，所以其實workload都未算好大，考前望下都足夠。

reviews.author: Wwwww
reviews.comment_content:
主要topics:
- K-map minimization
- combinational logic
- vhdl
- pmos/nmos
- flip-flops
- counter
- multiplexers/demultiplexers
- finite-state machine design (moore/mealy)
同elec1100冇咩分別，教嘅野會深入少少
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof Wei 教書清晰，每個topic都講得好仔細。加上有lecture video 會準時upload，平時唔洗去上堂，得閒睇一次就得。
Tang tang tutorial 必去，會教晒lab點做同埋midterm/final會出嘅題型。臨考前溫一溫佢份tutorial notes就得，基本上會出番類似嘅野。
reviews.comment_grading:
- Lab 30%
- Midterm 30%
- Final 40%
- hw 0% (交唔交都得)
reviews.comment_workload:
workload = lab。8次lab要去夠7次，少過7次成科fail。hardware lab 要提前畫好晒circuit去到砌，software lab 就要提早幾日寫好code去run一次，加上要自學vhdl(lecture唔會教)，一唔好彩debug都晒幾粒鐘。
midterm/final 算輕鬆，提前溫下睇明晒份hw/tutorial notes就會識做。

reviews.author: Tim Poon
reviews.title: 好玩又靚grade
reviews.comment_content: 讀過elec1100的同學應該會覺得極度輕鬆,因為只是1100的內容加深少少而已
reviews.comment_teaching:
Tang Tang教得真的好
而且幾乎24小時stand-by
我們半夜12點發email問問題都秒覆
lecture可以看video
tutorial不建議走
reviews.comment_grading:
lab差不多滿分
MT Mean=45.2, Std=23.3 score=36
final mean=52.4, stdev=24.8 score=85
如果在中間位,有做assignment可以升一個subgrade(但我1份都沒有交)
A-
reviews.comment_workload:
每星期都有lab而且需要prelab但看著tutorial note都還算易做
最後個project和lab是一樣的,只是TA不會幫手,還有做完有問題問而已

reviews.author: Super Toxic Man
reviews.title: super good grade course
reviews.comment_content:
It is about the logic design: K-map and Boolean.
Another part is combinational and sequenctial circuits.
And then, it is extended to the detail: Counter and Register.
reviews.comment_teaching: She teach very well and she will emphasize the main point by her lecture. also, each lecture video will be uploaded to website so that i think attendance may not be necessary.
reviews.comment_grading:
Very easy and good grade.
mean is around 50 (midterm and final)
midterm 86/100 (above 1.7 sd)
final 84/100 (above 1.5 sd)
Then i get A. (sad with no plus)
Lab may be only ~ 75% Marks ( some may difficult)
overall, it is a good grade course.
reviews.comment_workload: Only Lab will have higher workload.

reviews.author: jimmyfungchan
reviews.title: no good grade, main in logic
reviews.comment_content: Logical content and haven't use in daily and not interesting and boring content. Need study by myself and I think lesson are not useful for deal with midterm and final
reviews.comment_teaching: Have not attend any lesson.
reviews.comment_grading: midterm below mean 1 sd and all homework almost full mark, but final 97/100, above 2.xx sd, final grade B+. Midterm and final no mc and straight forward question.
reviews.comment_workload: Quite heavy workload, one assignment per two weeks and one lab per a week. Must pre-lab before the lab. The lab almost finish and the labs are not difficult to finish.

reviews.author: SamD
reviews.comment_content: It includes almost everything you learnt from 1100, like the flip-flops, the logic gates, the K-map, with quite some other stuff like and-or-inverter (AOI), and other different type of ICs, which if you pay attention, they should not be difficult to understand.
reviews.comment_teaching: In the lecture, Vincent’s voice can make you fall asleep quite easily (for me I think, probably because the lecture is in the afternoon). But he is very patient in teaching. As for Tang Tang, he is a funny guy and I suggest you to go to every tutorial.
reviews.comment_grading: The grade for this course is good for me. If you pay some attention in tutorial and try out some questions, getting a B is easy.
reviews.comment_workload: The homework is optional though they said they will take it into consideration if you are at the boundary of 2 grades. You can just leave the homework if you have a very busy schedule (given that you are able to understand and solve similar type of question like those in the homework later on). You also need to prepare for the labs since there is preparation mark for it. But the preparation won’t take a long time as Tang Tang will explain almost everything during the tutorial and you only need to do some modifications base on that.

reviews.author: yusless
reviews.title: Could be annoying if you don't have a good partner
reviews.comment_content:
Have not taken 1100, but heard it's similar in content.

A lot of emphasis on labs, so make sure you have a GOOD lab partner that you can work with along the way because you WON'T be able to change lab partners. Better yet, scout your lab partners as soon as possible.

Labs are either software labs or mixed labs (software + hardware). Software labs just require you to demonstrate whether your circuit works or not to TAs and answer the questions. Mixed labs require you to show them both your software schematic and you have to use actual ICs to build the circuit during the lab sessions. BONUS marks will be given to those who are able to finish the circuits quickly and successfully present them for TAs to sign.

Mini-project is basically just a lab assignment, so just treat it the same way as labs.
reviews.comment_teaching:
You can review lecture videos online on the course website, so whether you attend the lectures or not is your choice.

However, I think the lecturer is quite boring with a monotonous voice most of the time, but at the same time, he can provide extra insight in some of the more difficult questions.

Tang Tang is quite helpful, so I encourage you to attend his tutorials. Humorous guy and approachable, and you can have a better understanding of the course content.
reviews.comment_grading: Fair grading, with lots of emphasis on the labs, exams and midterms. Exams just test you on the understanding of the course contents as there are some tricky questions. Overall, the paper is not that long so just be careful when you attend the exam.
reviews.comment_workload:
Prelabs have to be done before every lab.

Exams can be tricky so just take your time and be careful regarding the questions. You need a good understanding of the course content to have a good grade.

reviews.author: sfiend
reviews.title: good grade
reviews.comment_content:
Similar to ELEC 1100 such as K-Map, Boolean Algebra, Truth table, FSM, Flip Flop, etc.
New topics are VHDL(coding), decoder, MUX, PLD(Programmable Logic Device), AOI, transistor, CMOS, etc.
reviews.comment_teaching: Tang Tang 教得幾好, 最好唔好走佢既tutorial, 因為對做lab幾有幫助
reviews.comment_grading:
midterm 30%, mean=55, std=23.1, median=52
lab 30% (including pre-lab, demo, summary sheet)
final 40%, mean=48.3, stdev=24.2, median=48

me:
mid-term 90/100
final 78/100
lab ~75%
overall A

my frd:
midterm 78/100
final 83/100
lab ~75%
overall A

easy to get A range if you pay afford
reviews.comment_workload:
一定要pre lab!!!!!!!!!
有prelab questions會係lab開始個時check
同埋唔pre既話好大機會唔夠時間做晒D lab,
尤其後期要你寫完code再砌circuit,
砌circuit都差唔多個幾鐘先搞掂
lab係2個人一組
2個人做既話workload都應該ok

hw雖然佢話唔計分, 但用黎清concept都幾有用, 不過我做左3次就冇再交

reviews.author: zzzzzzz
reviews.comment_content: 基本上同elec1100冇分別,只係多左VHDL, PLD, etc.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Lecture 只需要上midterm前一堂同最後一堂,因為係review sessions.
Tutorial 一定要上.Tang Tang 係好有心機教既ta,基本上你肯問,佢就肯答.
如果pre lab有問題,send封email 比佢,好多時都會見到佢親自落黎解答.
reviews.comment_grading:
lab 30%
midterm 30%
final 40%

midterm: mean 55/100, s.d. 23.1
final: mean 48/100, s.d. 24.2

參考成績:
lab ~80%
midterm 100/100
final 79/100
Overall grade:A+
reviews.comment_workload:
以一個4cred course 唔算特別大workload.
HW有5份,全部optional,唔計grade,但係如果marginal case 有機會幫你升1個subgrade.
每個星期都有lab,要做pre lab,但係tutorial會教左90%,所以難度唔大,只要揾好labmate係2hrs入面做完係冇問題.
Midterm同final 前做一兩次tutorial既example就幫到你温80%.

reviews.author: niccccyy
reviews.title: Review Summary
reviews.comment_content:
Similar to elec1100, may be even easier than elec1100 since there is no project (just labs and a "mini project", but the project is no different from lab). Some labs need to use the software OrCAD to show the result or manipulate the IC.

This course is mainly about the introduction and some application of gates (AND gate, OR gate) by finishing the labs using ICs. After midterm would be a little bit more difficult, which is about Sequential Circuits and FSM. But it is still quite easy and straightforward.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Quite well. Every lecture is recorded and can be reviewed on the course website.
Tang Tang is kind and friendly, feel free to ask him anything you do not understand.
reviews.comment_grading:
Personally, the grading is quite well.
Labs do not need to get full marks and still able to get A+.
The midterm and final are testing your carefulness since they are very simple but a little bit tricky.
reviews.comment_workload:
Prelabs are the only workload.
Lectures are easy to follow, not much revision is needed.
Homeworks are not counted to the final grade.

reviews.author: Pocketmoney
reviews.comment_content:
Similar to elec1100, may be even easier than elec1100 since there is no project (just labs and a "mini project", but the project is no different from lab). Some labs need to use the software OrCAD to show the result or manipulate the IC.

This course is mainly about the introduction and some application of gates (AND gate, OR gate) by finishing the labs using ICs. After midterm would be a little bit more difficult, which is about Sequential Circuits and FSM. But it is still quite easy and straightforward.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Quite well. Every lecture is recorded and can be reviewed on the course website.
Tang Tang is kind and friendly, feel free to ask him anything you do not understand.
reviews.comment_grading:
Personally, the grading is quite well.
Labs do not need to get full marks and still able to get A+.
The midterm and final are testing your carefulness since they are very simple but a little bit tricky.
reviews.comment_workload:
Prelabs are the only workload.
Lectures are easy to follow, not much revision is needed.
Homeworks are not counted to the final grade.

reviews.author: ktbenji27
reviews.comment_content: similar to elec 1100 but you have to learn how to manipulate some software to draw schematic and wave form etc
reviews.comment_teaching: very good
reviews.comment_grading: above average, as long as you attend the lab the tutorial and the lecture you should be able to mean the mean score of the course, which is relatively easy
reviews.comment_workload: not many, but remember to do all the prelab by yourself and try to do as much research about each lab beforehand to shorten your time taken in each lab, the homework doesnt count towards exam marks so it doesnt  matter

reviews.author: ryy
reviews.comment_content: The course includes logic gates, combination logic circuits, flip flops and sequential logic circuits.Not very difficult if you attend the lectures and tutorials.
reviews.comment_teaching: Nice professor. His teaching is very clear and easy to understand.
reviews.comment_grading: You will get good grade if you do well in midterm and final exam.  The course adapts a curved grading policy. labs accounts for 30%,midterm accounts for 30% and final accounts for40%.
reviews.comment_workload: 1 homework per 2 weeks. But you have to do labs every week, and sometimes it takes a long time to do pre-lab.

reviews.author: JuJu
reviews.comment_content:
Pretty much the advanced elec1100
Include VHDL code, K maps, truth table...
reviews.comment_teaching:
Definitely the best Lecturers.
Clear Pronunciation
Clear Logic
Willing to help students and humorous
Prepared well for the class
reviews.comment_grading:
Good grading generally but not for careless people.
Each section gets heavy mark and a single wrong wire causes students all the points of the question.So to get good
grade you should be extra careful
reviews.comment_workload:
Not hard if you go to every lecture
About two weeks for one HW (heavy if you do it in last two or three days)

reviews.author: sgargaa
reviews.title: Good course
reviews.comment_content: The content is not as hard as other 2000-level ELEC courses. A lot is repeated from ELEC1100 and hence makes it easy to follow up.
reviews.comment_teaching: Prof. Yobas is one of the best professors. He goes slow and takes all doubts in class. He explains the concepts very well, and above all this he puts the lecture videos online. Tang Tang is one of the best TAs also. His tutorials are very extensive and cover everything that is taught in the lectures. Final examination is actually based on his second last and last tutorial questions.
reviews.comment_grading: Mean would be B- and mean + SD would be A-. The mean during midterm is pretty low. If you attend the lectures or even try understanding the concepts on your own, the course is easy. Assignments are optional, but if you score well in them your final grade is raised by one sub-grade.
reviews.comment_workload: Decent workload. Labs are to be done with one partner and you get bonus to finish it early. You also have 24-hour access to the labs.

reviews.author: Byiu
reviews.comment_content: 一開始教logic gate, k-map, 好多以前ELEC1100學過下, 跟住就design of combinatorial and sequential logic circuits, counter, finite state machine
reviews.comment_teaching:
YOBAS教得幾好, 一講到佢認為好重要既 concept, 會講得好慢, 同好清楚, 但亦因為咁有時上堂會好悶, 例如k-map都唔明點解可以講到咁多堂

TA TANG TANG真係好好, 好熱心教學, 好多學生都好鍾意問佢野, 我有一次有野唔明email問佢, 佢reply佐我幾次email, 好似驚我唔明咁.
reviews.comment_grading:
midterm~30%
final~40%
lab + mini project ~ 30%

midterm above 半個sd, final above1個sd
最後-> b+

呢科學既野唔算難, 只係最緊要做exam果陣小心d, 因為通常小小野錯, 後面既野會全部錯哂, 會冇好佐好多分. exam前最緊要睇tutorial, 佢exam大部份題目都會係tutorial果方面出
reviews.comment_workload:
堂可以走, 但tutorial就最好上, 因為note有好多文字, 其實好多野都冇咩用, 反而tutorial就會講哂重點出黎, 如果睇notes會睇好耐.

有hw不過唔計分

呢科最大既workload就係每個星期既lab+1份mini project, lab做得快有bonus. lab事前做好prelab 去到都係跟住個circuit整出黎, 但最緊要都係小心d, 如果有錯, check error可以check你好耐

reviews.author: Jonas
reviews.title: what a boring course
reviews.comment_content:
combinational logic
sequential logic
reviews.comment_teaching: I think Prof. teached very slowly before the midterm. He spent too much time on K-map before the mid term.
reviews.comment_grading:
mid term 30%
final 40%
lab 30%
mid term mean 50.9 sd 24
final mean 57.7 sd 24.3

The mean is B- for this course. Actually, I think you do not need to attend the lecture even you want to get a good grade. Just going to tutorial is enough.
reviews.comment_workload: There is a lab every week. If you miss one of the labs, you fail the course.Prof. said homework is not graded.If you did all the homeworks, he said he will increase a subgrade of your final grade.(But I think it is fake)

reviews.author: Duke of N.T.
reviews.comment_content: 一開頭會感覺慢，又係果啲基本野啦。開始好玩嘅係Multiplexer呀、Flip Flop果啲。內容唔算多，所以可以集中溫。
reviews.comment_teaching: Professor同TANG TANG都幾好。雖然Professor好努力確保大家都明白所有內容，但有時候過多黑面同過於嚴格，例如上堂一傾計就話你再講就叫你出去。TANG TANG嘅Tutorial一定要上呀！同埋佢係一個好勤力嘅TA。
reviews.comment_grading: 唔太清楚，但TANG TANG會遂個同學send email同你講分，所以透明度極高，有咩事都可以即刻搵返。
reviews.comment_workload:
LAB係好玩，不過就好chur，每星期都有LAB，內容都幾多下，仲要做Prelab。不過咁，功課係optional，有五份。考試內容同功課極度相似甚至會一樣，所以中規中距俾個C啦。最後有個叫Miniproject其實係一個冇得問人嘅lab，所以下面我冇tick project。

留意返，LAB走一個，LAB REPORT唔交一次，你成科就係咁先。呢個policy係professor要求的。

reviews.author: Aye
reviews.comment_content: At first, it is something about advanced knowledge in ELEC1100. Then, more contents are added and some of them are more difficult. They will be useful for circuit design.
reviews.comment_teaching: I don't know too much of this.
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading is quite good. You can get A+ with exams above around 1.5 sd from mean.
The exams are much easier than those pastpapers. So don't be scared before the final exam.
reviews.comment_workload:
Several homeworks which are helpful for exams.
Some of the labs cost a lot of time due to the bugs occurred in coding. Please finish the codes before the lab. There is an 'interview' in the last lab --- the TAs will ask you some basic questions about the lab.
Above all, the workload is quite light.

reviews.author: Amets
reviews.comment_content: The course content is similar to ELEC1100, which is about KMAP, counters, memory. It is not difficult if you study.
reviews.comment_teaching: Professor is fine. But it seems the TA Tang Tang understands the course clearer. One important point is that Tang Tang designs the homework and the exam paper. Make sure you attend the tutorial cuz he likes leaving mistakes in the notes and explains them in tutorial. If you don't know about them, you'll spend hours in lab doing nothing.
reviews.comment_grading:
Work hard on homework and attend the tutorials. B range is not difficult. A range is attainable.

Midterm:
The mean was 58.3, stdev=24.4, max=100, median=61, min=0.

Final:
The full mark is 100, max=100, min=0, mean=63, stdev=23.1, median=64.

Above 1 SD => A-
reviews.comment_workload: The lab is a bit annoying. Do the prelab and finish the software lab in advance if possible. The assignments are optional. Overall workload is okay.

reviews.author: bryanaa
reviews.title: ELEC 1100 REVISITED
reviews.comment_content: The majority of the content are from ELEC 1100 such as K-Map, Boolean Algebra, FSM, etc.
reviews.comment_teaching:
I think Prof. Bermak is one of the best instructors in UST. He always makes sure to that no student in his class gets left behind by making his class interactive.

I feel that Tang Tang one of the most (if not the most) hard-working TA out there. Although it is really difficult to comprehend what he says because of his accent, he never hesitates when I asked him bunch of questions. Fun fact: he always replies my e-mails no later than 30 mins :P . More than that, he prepares all the materials of the tutorial and review questions.

If you have to review for exams, just read from his notes, they are more than enough
reviews.comment_grading: Prof. Bermak is very lenient in terms of grading. That's all :)
reviews.comment_workload: A little bit hectic because of the labs + homework + mini project.

reviews.author: Ken
reviews.comment_content: 開頭會教boolean algebra , truth table, k-map,or gate, xor gate, and gate等等基本知識, 這些上過1100 已經學過了, 之後教sequential logic, 最後開做FSM
reviews.comment_workload:
以一個4cre 既course,workload 可以接受
有4/5份assignment 做,今個sem比較特別, assignment唔計overall grade,反而 在grade 同grade 中間既margain 先用assignment個份睇你拎咩grade

reviews.author: app_Sci
reviews.title: Easy Contents but Not Good of a Grade as I'd thought
reviews.comment_content:
1. Numbers (binary, 2's complement, etc.)
2. Boolean algebra and logic gates.
3.Gate minimization and combinational logic.
4. VHDL
5.Sequential logic (flip-flops, etc.)
6.Registers and counters
7. FSM
The contents are just a continuation of ELEC1100.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Tang Tang is awesome. He emails your mark privately to you. He also teaches the tutorials and it was very good.
Yobas explains things pretty clearly, I'd say. I personally like the teaching style.
reviews.comment_grading:
I would not say that the course is "good grade", sure, the contents are easy, but average grading and easy contents would be a more accurate description of this course.
Because the contents are rather easy, the tests are testing more on how careful you are rather than how much course material you know (because the contents are easy).
Lab 30%
Midterm 30%
Final 40%
HW 0% (But could improve subgrade if did really well)
Lab around average
Midterm Mean+1SD
Final Mean+0.6SD
HW: Didnt do HW4. HW3 Full mark. HW 1,2&5 got 60% of marks.
Ended up with a B+, thought I could get higher...
reviews.comment_workload:
Course workload is alright. The main workload comes from prelab for the labs, and also the homeworks (If u wish to do it).
Prelabs took like 1-2 hours before lab.
Doing the homework is not necessary but strongly recommended. The exam questions are more or less the same to those in homeworks.
The last lab is a "miniproject" but its more of a harder lab that you cant ask around for solutions.

reviews.author: YUENSC
reviews.title: Useless Course
reviews.comment_content:
Watch other posts la.

Design of combinatorial and sequential logic circuits; introduction to logic families (TTL and CMOS); programmable logic devices; special digital systems. Laboratory assignments make extensive use of computer-aided design (CAD) tools for design, simulation and testing.
reviews.comment_teaching:
I Can't even hear her words. Pronunciation is absolutely not clear

It is advised to revise the lecture notes by yourself and ask Tang Tang if any questions
reviews.comment_grading:
Good Grade
MT: 94 The full mark is 100, Max=100, Min=1, Mean=60.1, Std=21.4, Median=63.8.
Final: 91 The full mark is 100, max=95, min=0, mean=53.7, stdev=24.8, median=60.
Letter Grade: A+
reviews.comment_workload:
HW
Lab
MT
Final

HW is worth doing although it is not counted for your grade.

Lab is challenging as orcad is suck

Final and midterm is not easy if you dont understand the lecture well.
suggest asking Tang Tang or find other materials as the lecture notes sucks too
